name: Solar Loss
description:
Solar Loss is an arcade game where you drive your ship through rocks and various obstacles. Your goal is simple : travel this world as long as possible ! It's an endless 3D runner.

This game is totally free and you can explore 3 themes with 3 levels each one. Each time you succeed to pass all of those, your speed increase so the challenge becomes harder.

We created this game for a new Unity training day : you can subscribe (only in french) at : www.equilibregames.com/training .

If you want new features, please send us an email at : benoitc@equilibregames.com .
